== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: 1.1
var:
  description: a variable
  default: 9
  choices:
    jinja: |
      {% for n in trange(0, 10) %}
      {{ n }}
      {% endfor %}
    return_type: number
    description: choices is 0 to 9
----
